Body: I'm really getting mad with this one..! I tried to root the emulator, Adb commands executed and shows no error. But I can't run the apps which needs root access.  It says that, Need root access..!How can i determine that my emulator is rooted..! Besides, I wanna capture the phone screen and make it as video to play back. How can i do this..? I don't mind about rooting. I don't have any idea about this one.Please suggest me something.How can i record each frame in android phone..? Would you please help me with sample source or some suggestions..?
Title: How to take a video capture of the screen?
